name: Beat The Clock
description:
You were accused and found guilty of temporal crimes, crimes against time that you did not commit. Sentenced to 10,000 millennia in the cells of Chronos, the thought of impending madness weighed heavily on you. But, perhaps there's a glimmer of hope. Those foolish Chronosians didn't find your trusty stopwatch. Armed with your timepiece, there may be a way out of here...

BREAK FREE

Stop your timepiece at exactly 1 second and earn your freedom.


But be warned, time is not something to be played with lightly.

UPGRADE, UPGRADE, UPGRADE

With over 30 upgrades, your timepiece will be brimming with power.

PROVE YOUR WORTH

Prove your worth and earn badges by completing 20 challenges. Be warned, they are not for the faint of heart.
